Text:
Minimum System Requirements

* OS: Windows XP , Vista or Windows 7
 * CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4Ghz or AMD Athlon X2 5400+
 * RAM: 2 GB
 * HDD: 15 GB free disk space
 * Graphics: AMD HD2600 or NVIDIA Geforce 8600
 * Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

Recommended System Requirements

* OS: Windows Vista or Windows 7
 * CPU: AMD Bulldozer or Intel Core i7
 * RAM: 4 GB
 * HDD: 15 GB free disk space
 * Graphics: AMD HD6000 Series or Nvidia GTX500 Series
 * Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
is the game updated with the latest patches?

When install finishes, Security Center and Firewall services will be stopped on Windows 7 64 bit machine.
Trying to manually turn those services back on, didn't work.
Needed to go through hoops to get security related services back to work.
So be warned!
this is a very good version! Worked with Win 7 64-bit. Thanks a lot. BTW this version is 1.0.2, does this mean that patch 1 and 2 are included? Thanks in advance! Cheers.
